comment: I HIGHLY recommend taking his class. He is very on top of things like grading and giving students feedback on assignments. He gives you plenty of time to turn your things in for a good grade if you miss an assignment window. His lectures for the online class are short and straight to the point. Overall, one of the best teachers I have had.

All the assignments build on each other so pay attention. SHOW UP TO CLASS, THOSE IN CLASS ASSIGNMENTS WILL HELP YOU! He was pretty understanding as long as you explained it to him prior. He's so funny and chill about everything, I actually looked forward to going to his class at 10 in the morning.

Could not recommend professor Rood more than enough as your ENGL 1102 credit. He makes class and the assignments simple and straight to the point. He gives amazing feedback and allows you to resubmit assignments for a better grade. Definitely attend class as it is apart of your grade but half the time he ends class early. 10/10 would recommend.

This class was amazing! Very funny teacher, only had 4 major assignments but in class assignments were a big part of the grade too. He does cuss sometimes so if you have a problem with that oh well but personally I recommend you take him as your professor.

Probably one of the funniest teachers I've had! I've never made a rating before but he deserves all the 5 stars he can get. There's no way that you can't pass this class with an A or B unless you don't try. He does a lot of in class assignments so try to go to class. But other than that his class is fairly easy and he makes it enjoyable. TAKE HIM!!

Awesome professor! Keep in mind that some assignments are done in person (for a grade) and not online! It will help you with future assignments! Plus, he deeply cares about the students' success. I'd recommend him if you're struggling with writing essays. Overall, this course with him was fun and unique!

There is so much to say with so little room in this box. He is such a funny guy oh my god. He is such a real person, and he cares about you a lot. His feedback is amazing, and he gets what he needs you to know into your head. He does cuss so if you have issues with that beware. Would take it again, he's such a fun dude.

Super energetic and caring guy who wants his students to do well. If you show up to class, do the work, and seek help when you need it, it will be an easy A. He's a genuine guy who understands struggles and is very helpful. Only thing to note is he does cuss a decent bit, so if that bothers you, here is your heads up. Would recommend 100%.

Super energetic and caring guy who wants his students to do well. If you show up to class, do the work, and seek help when you need it, it will be an easy A. He's a genuine guy who understands struggles and is very helpful. Only thing to note is he does cuss a decent bit, so if that bothers you, here is your heads up.

Prof. Rood was an amazing teacher. His class was a breath of fresh air. Only two essays then a project, very straight forward and also on interesting topics. If you go to class you will get a better grade for sure as there are some assignments only available in class. Would def take him again and you should too!
I wish I had him for every class.

Professor Rood was amazing! It was a very easy class that helped me grow as a writer. I took his summer class so it was shorter than normal, but we only had 2 papers and a final presentation. Each one held my attention as it wasn't some boring topic but something interesting. He also gave detailed feedback on each of the major assignments. 10/10
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--Graded by few things

comment: Proffesor Rood is such a vibe. His class is very straightforward he has multiple assignments but they're all pretty simple to complete so if you do all of them you should be fine. Go to class because he usually has participation grades that you can't do if you don't attend.
He gives so many opportunities for you to submit your work. He is hilarious and I really enjoyed his teachings on horror literature

He is cares about your success and teaches skills that can assist you later on. He only assigned 2 essays this semester and a final project. Make sure you attend class since he sometimes assigns work that you can only complete during class. He also gives great feedback when it comes to asking for assistance when writing essays.

He by far is probably one of the best English teachers. If you want to have a good time or if you struggle with English-based classes, I recommend taking his class. The assignments are interesting, and he does a project-based final. He is a very caring professor and will answer all of your questions, through email or in person.

Totally recommend him if you're not good at writing. He tries his best to help you and at the same time gives you time to rewrite any assignment you feel wasn't your best work. Very nice very easy to talk to.
If you do the work and try he will go out of his way to help you.

I took him for 3 years now and hands down the best English professor EVER! Attendance is mandatory but class is fun so I promise you'll want to show up. He is easy to work with, his assignments are never stressful. It's an easy A class. Make sure to read the books/movies he assigns since he does like to talk about them during class!
rating_tags: Caring--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: This is my second time reviewing Mr.Rood after taking both 1101 and 1102. I enjoyed both classes and he is an extremely chill, hilarious, and approachable teacher! I highly recommend you to take him!
He's amazing but my only complaint is you don't learn much

Professor Rood is the easiest professor at KSU. Make sure you go to class because you'll b graded for coming(small assignments). He is really chill and gives you a chance to make up your big assignments! TAKE HIM!!!!!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I love Professor Rood. One of the best teachers at KSU. He is hilarious & has no filter. He doesn't give out too much work, but the work he does give out he grades in a timely manner and gives great feedback. Pray you have an early registration ticket so you can get him!!

Funniest, non-filter professor you'll have. There are in class assignments so you need to go, but trust me, you'll want to go. He learns everyone's names. Loves to joke around. Just do the work and try and you'll have an A.

This dude is awesome. I liked him within the first ten minutes of his first class. He's funny, doesn't have a cookie cutter style of teaching, makes an otherwise boring subject into an interesting class, and will be there to help you if you need it. If you have the opportunity to take him, don't miss it. Favorite professor by far.

Best English teacher ever! He is laid back, hilarious, but also takes his job seriously. He genuinely wants to make you better at writing and analyzing the media around you. He made me look forward to going to class. He also gives great feedback on assignments. There are extra credit opportunities to replace missed assignments or boost your grade.

Show up to class and do the assignments on time and you are gonna get at least a B. Rood's class is fun and engaging so as long as you just participate he will make it very clear and easy for you to understand. He curses a lot so if that's an issue don't take this class. Also sign up for his 1102 ASAP because the spots fill in like the first hour.

Professor Rood is funny, easygoing, and provides good feedback and help. Doesn't take attendance but has in-class activities that you have to submit with your name. No class when working on major assignments. He gives group projects and presentations but has a lot of extra credits (2 to 5% of the final grade).

Great teacher! His projects are fun and he is very understanding. If you aren't the biggest fan of english, taking his class will change that. He takes a different approach to teaching you how to analyze and he does it in a very creative way. I definitely recommend him.
Class was laid back, only 3-4 major projects and assignments could be submitted 1-2 days late. Overall is a great professor :)

- Enjoyable to listen to
- Fun topics & in-class activities
- Deadlines didn't seem to be strict 100% of the time, as he often pushed stuff back a day or two when people asked.

Absolutely hated this professor. Spends the entire class cussing and making jokes when we were supposed to be discussing English topics. We wrote essays on boring topics like Black Mirror and our discussion posts were never English related either, talking about Kendrick Lamar when we should've been discussing Kayne and Adam Sandler

Genuinely amazing instructor and great guy- his class is one of the best GenEds you will ever take. Rood is very straight and to the point with all of his projects and is very passionate about having his students gain the most out of his class. He's funny and makes his lectures fun to go to. My only complaint is how long he spent on Monster Mansion
If you don't take him, you're stupid.

He does an amazing job teaching this class. He gives you extra days to turn in assignments and the extra credit is so easy. I love his class and I would for sure take it again! Definitely take his class!
Best guy ever. Take him. You're stupid if you don't.

Fantastic professor! Such a great class. As long as you put in some kind of effort you'll do fine. Realistic assignments and deadlines, tends to extend due dates. Great lectures and actually made me want to come to class. Literally one of the best professors at KSU. Would 100% recommend to anyone for 1101 or 1102!

One thing that's kind of bad about him is that he can get confusing. The way he explains his content doesn't make sense but if that is ever the case just ask him bc he WILL explain. Honestly one of the best professors at KSU, I've taken him both for ENGL 1101 & 1102. He's easy but show up to class to actually pass. His class is fun
Overall your going to pass if you just pay attention. Super nice teacher too.

If theirs a professor I would take over and over its professor rood. That's why I got him for my 1102. Although I got a C+, I also really didn't do a lot of the assignments. assignments that were easy, fun, and interesting. Shame on me. The grade I got is on me, but for you easy A+. Highly Recommend taking the class especially if you're a freshman.

He was quite literally one of the best professors Ive ever had. He constantly made class entertaining, and the majority of the work was easy, so as long as you did the bare minimum, you would probably get an A. He also gave the best feedback on his assignments compared to other professors.
He is funny, he isn't hard on the grading the first couple times, he gives you chances and if your class is good enough he extends due dates

I took Rood for Spring 2021, and I'm only now getting around to writing a review for him. I'll keep it short and sweet. If you have the chance to take him, do so. He gives very clear feedback, is very engaging, informative, and most of all, entertaining. He makes the work fun, not a chore. Good shot at getting an A, easy B if you put the effort in.

He was extremely helpful when it came to teaching us how to write. He was funny and got the class engaged with the music videos he played and the things he talked about so that we could understand how to analyze things in literature. Would recommend him 100% to anyone who wants to become a better writer but not be overwhelmed. Pretty awesome prof.

Professor Rood is seriously the best professor at Kennesaw, do your work and it is an easy A. He actually cares about his students too and makes life as easy for you as he can. And he is one of the funniest guys i have met.

Probably the best professor I have had so far at Kennesaw. Going to his classes are not boring due to both the content he gives and him as a person makes it interesting. 10/10 recommend taking no doubt.
10/10 would recommend. Great and inspirational professor.
Rood is the man! He seriously is a very cool dude who cares about his students and is here to help us become better writers. I 11/10 recommend taking him!!!
He is such a good teacher! He does expect you to do your part, but he is there to help and make you a better writer. Professor Rood was hilarious and I will miss him.
Super easy, just two essays and a final project for the major assignments. If you keep up youll do just fine. Professor Rood is super nice but isnt afraid to tell you the truth. Great class!
I put maybe 2 hours of work per into the class and all the work is pretty easy, there was two essays but nothing bad. Rood is a cool dude, definitely recommend him for the class!

Professor Rood is honestly the greatest. If you attend the lectures (mine were online) and do the required assignments/2 essays/1 project, you'll get an easy A. He also offers extra credit (all you have to do is write 2 short poems about anything for 5 points added to your grade). The weekly assignments were easy and not time-consuming. Take him!!!

While he can be a little condescending at times, Professor Rood is a nice guy, his lectures are entertaining, he doesn't take himself too seriously, and he is pretty good at answering questions you may have about assignments, I would absolutely take him again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Hilarious

comment: He gives way too much work and id very condescending
